description:
Takanashi Himari is http://anidb.net/ch86017 [Hikari]`s twin sister, who is an ordinary human. She is much more serious than her sister, both as a person and a student. She often tries to make her sister act more mature, but is unable to. Despite their constant bickering, they care about each other and have many similarities such as similar tastes in food and fashion.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Takanashi Himari
